page.title: 08SELSEY CARNIVAL 1985
page.content: The main event is the Carnival,held every year in the summer.There are rides like the BigWheel and the Octopuss which people can pay to go on.There are Coconut Shies and Tombolas and items of that sort.This is part of the Fair.There are fancy dress competions which are chosen earlier on in the year.There are stalls selling things.Its held on the recreation ground so theres a playground and tatels with a carpark. one of the highlights is the Carnival Procession floats which are judged and given prizes of money and cups and they parade in line down certain roads.They hold collecting containers and money is given each year for a different charity each year.Sometimes there are other attractions.There are other events like Bonfire Night,Donkey Derby,Half Marothon,Selsey Horse Show.
